description:
Hello everybody,

Here's a little video of how to drink and enjoy whisky!!

http://www.youtube.co...

=) Enjoy!!

Julien

Here's a small guideline how to taste whisky:

http://laboutiqueduchemin.be/whisky-la-degustation-tasting/

(no worries, it's in english!)
name: whisky tasting

description:
Hello Everybody,


Here are the different distilleries that we'll try :


Dailuane, Alt-A-Bhaine, Fettercairn, Glen Elgin, Glen Spey, Arran, The Speyside, Glentauchers, Glenfarclas, Highland Park, Longmorn, Glen Scotia, Aberlour, Caperdonich, Bunnahabhain, Ledaig, Bowmore, Lagavulin, Caol Ila, Laphroaig.


Aged between 9 and 25 y.o , from 40° to 60.9° (Cask Strenght).


About your serviteur for the evening, I'm French, I've been educated to discover things and to be curious. I discovered whisky through my parents, having a sip sometimes as an aperitif. I develop my taste for it when I stayed in Scotland, visiting no less than 5 times the Edradour distillery. Since then, whisky has always been with me, through meeting new people, getting a room in a flat, and now introducing it to you.


The tasting will be quite easy, we'll start with whisky of lower alcohol level and climb the scale. We'll end it with the peaty selection! As it's a proper tasting, don't expect to have a regular 4cl in your glass. The aim isn't to drink them all. Spitting is necessary and advised. Otherwise, you won't be able to finish your tasting nor enjoy it until the end."

Hope to see you there! =) 

Julien
name: Whisky Tasting

description:
This time, it's an opportunity to discover the whisky from the various scottish islands. 10 distillery will be presented, asking you to choose between 3 for its full range to 4 and a selection for each. Around 50 whisky will be presented. It will cost you the usual 30€. =)

In order to accomodate everyone,

the tasting are running three times :
friday eve at 7.30pm 
saturday afternoon at 2.00pm 
and saturday eve at 4.30pm.

When you register, please mention the number of people, and the slot you'd like to attend to.

Note that places are limited, 12 is max. U'll be monitoring the number closely in order to let everybody know if there is a waiting list or not.

name: Whisky Tasting

description:
Hello Hello! Almost week end!  or at least TGIF! And what about TGIF and a great tasting about speyside whisky!!

Friday, May 23 7:30 PM
Saturday, May 24 2:00PM or 4:30 PM 

There are whiskies from 8 distilleries in tasting, between brackets you find the number of whiskies to taste : Allt-a-Bhaine (3) – Braeval/Braes-O-Glenlivet (3) – Dailuaine (5) – Glen Elgin (8) – Glenurgie (3) – Glenlivet (4) – MacAllan (5) – Miltonduff (4).
This will allow you o compare different whiskies from the same distillery with different ages, types of caks, ABV, bottlers….
You can choice whiskies of 3 or 4 distilleries with a maximum of 15 whiskies.
It is you who choose the distillies you want to “discover / test”..
The conditions of participation same as usual :
30 € per person (20 € for the members of our Club)
You receive a special discount on your purchase on the day of tasting.

the program : 

http://laboutiqueduchemin.be/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/Tasting-2014-may-Speyside-part-1.pdf


the reservations form :

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1ZEkhQbpvoas42KPcpm6cQD-s92qpOxf2DCsfLRGkdbs/viewform

Hope to see some of you there! =) 

Slainthe! 

Julien
name: Whisky Tasting

description:
Join us for our first tasting of the year! :)

You'll have the opportunity to taste 7 whisky from Scotland.
The list will come tomorrow!
Stay tuned for the coming info!! ;)

Slainthe!
Julien
name: Whisky Tasting

description: Tasting of Douglas of Drumlanrig, First edition, and Sovereign edition. Please check the comment section. :)
